description:
Tabby is a web technology based terminal heavily inspired by Hyper. It is, however, designed for people who need to get things done.

Runs on Windows, macOS and Linux
Theming and color schemes
Configurable hotkey schemes
GNU Screen style hotkeys available by default
Full Unicode support including double-width characters
Doesn't choke on fast-flowing outputs
Tab persistence on macOS and Linux
Proper shell-like experience on Windows including tab completion (thanks, Clink!)
CMD, PowerShell, Cygwin, Git-Bash and Bash on Windows support
Default Linux style hotkeys for copy (Ctrl+Shift+C) and paste (Ctrl+Shift+V)

## Package parameters
- `/allusers` - Install in allusers folder(C:\Program Files\Tabby) instead of user profile's folder.

Example: choco install tabby --params "/allusers"
summary: A terminal for a more modern age (formerly Terminus)
author: Eugene Pankov (and contributors)
